ComicInfo.Summary:
Robots are taking over the world.
Brit throws El Chupacabra off the team after Cast Iron's death, then he must expel Yeti when he learns that the creature is only twelve years old. Meanwhile, the Order continues their global assault and keeps adding members.
ComicInfo.Writer: Benito J. Cereno,Robert Kirkman,Chris Giarrusso,Benito Cereno,Chris Giarrusso,Robert Kirkman,Benito Cereno
ComicInfo.Title: Part 5
ComicInfo.Teams: Guardians of the Globe,The Order,WolfCorps,Global Defense Agency
